item.title: How to Book Better Airbnbs for Less Money
item.description:
How to Book Better Airbnbs for Less Money

How to successfully book your first-choice listings and get them for cheaper.

item.title: VALDRES - A Norwegian Landscape Time-Lapse
item.description:
VALDRES - A Norwegian Landscape Time-Lapse

facebook.com/RustadMedia. Please watch in HD with headphones or good speakers for the best experience! NORWEGIAN: Denne sommeren var jeg så heldig å kunne jobbe og bo i Valdes. Mens jeg bodde her, lagde jeg denne time-lapse filmen av den nærliggende naturen og landskapet.

item.title: Travel Smarter: The Backpack That Doubles as a Mobile Office
item.description:
Travel Smarter: The Backpack That Doubles as a Mobile Office

Our pals at This is Ground recently launched a "smart" backpack that will make you feel like the coolest, most in-the-know traveler out there. Crossing town (or the globe) with a laptop, iPad, headphones, and WiFi port can weigh you down - but it's a reality for many, especially those who work from the road.
